args: Is this article primarily about a new action or announcement by the Trump administration/White House/Executive? Respond simply with "yes" or "no" . Migrants at border get message saying CBP One appointments ‘no longer valid’ CIUDAD JUÁREZ, Mexico — Ridel Jiménez arrived at the border bridge leading into Texas before dawn Monday with his wife and their infant daughter, hoping to be allowed into the United States after fleeing Cuba. They had waited six months in Mexico City for their appointment with U.S. immigration officials through CBP One, the mobile app the Biden administration launched and that President Donald Trump’s team has vowed to eliminate. Moments after Trump was sworn in, Jiménez logged into the app and saw a new message that left him flummoxed. “Existing appointments are no longer valid,” it said. Other migrants gathered around him logged onto the app and received the same message. One woman sat down and began to weep beneath a fleece blanket. Another leaned against a pole, buried her face into her gloved hands and cried. Jiménez made a video call to his mother, anxiously awaiting news in Cuba. “After everything we’ve done and gone through to get here,” Jiménez lamented. “If only I had had the appointment for three hours earlier. That’s why we tried.”
